      public void updateTicket(Ticket ticket)
      Update all columns for a ticket row with attributes from ticket instance

    • addTicket

      public void addTicket(Ticket ticket)
      Adds new row for Ticket in DB based on instance of ticket provided * SaleID in DB uses auto increment, so you do not need to define it here

    • removeTicket

      public void removeTicket(int ticketType, int ticketNo)
      Removes ticket from the DB does not allow tickets to be removed where sale ID is not null
      Parameters:
      ticketType - ticket type
      ticketNo - ticket number
